attributes.action: People post covid infection should be able to be exempt from the vaccination
attributes.additional_details: Natural immunity post covid infection should be prioritised. People should have a right to have a medical exemption if they have had covid and wasn't hospitalised. Create madical exemption as in the Austria government decided that people post covid infection are not required to vaccinate if they do not want to.
attributes.background: People post covid infection should have a right for medical exemption from vaccination if they wish to opt out.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Exempt NHS workers who have recovered from COVID from vaccination requirements: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603842

Exempt people who recover from COVID19 (with antibodies) from the vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602031
